cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 14 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This room contains 1x set of bunks comes with Bottom and Top Sheet, Towels and Duvet. Wall Heater and Spare Blanket is available in the room as well.  Unlimited Free WIFI.  Use of the Share Facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Deluxe 2 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: This Budget Deluxe is design for guest on a budget, comes with a double bed, Flat screen TV which has availability to internet TV only, Fridge, Tea &Coffee making.  The Cabin is a Stand alone & is very close to the shares showers and toilets.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

specialEventConditions.title: *Non Refundable Rate Bookings Only*
specialEventConditions.description: **Please note that all bookings are non-refundable rate bookings.  Cards will be charged after booking is made.**

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 18th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 18th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
